arts.ttl: Aubameyang scores 2 as Marseille moves on from players’ locker room fight with big win over Paris FC
arts.sum: Greenwood opened the scoring Saturday with a penalty before the Aubameyang show started with a spectacular finish in the 24th minute. Aubameyang restored Marseille’s lead after a gift from the Paris defense, Pierre-Emile Höjbjerg made it 4-2 in the 81st, and impressive substitute Robinio Vaz completed the scoring in stoppage time after Greenwood missed his second opportunity from the spot.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Marseille 5-2 Paris FC: Aubameyang scores brace as OM get back on track with win
arts.sum: Matchday 2 Ligue 1 McDonald’s, 23/08/2025 In the midst of a chaotic week of drama for Roberto De Zerbi’s Marseille, Les Olympiens get their first win of the 2025-2026 season…

arts.ttl: Paris FC predicted XI v Marseille: Willem Geubbels to make debut
arts.sum: Willem Geubells’ move from St. Gallen to Paris FC was completed on the day of Les Parisiens’ opening day defeat to SCO Angers last weekend. The former Olympique Lyonnais and AS Monaco…

arts.ttl: Facundo Medina set to miss Marseille’s games against Paris FC and Lyon
arts.sum: Facundo Medina (26) is set to miss weeks of football for new club Olympique de Marseille after he picked up an injury during training this week. As per information from…
